ExampleDefinition.Title: Spectrogram Chart
ExampleDefinition.Description:
The Spectrogram Demo showcases how to mix a 2D Line Chart showing a Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) of a waveform, and also show a Spectrogram (scrolling heatmap) of the same data.
The scrolling heatmap is achieved using a [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#Creating%20your%20First%20SciChartSurface.html']SciChartSurface[/url] with a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.FastHeatMapRenderableSeries.html']FastHeatMapRenderableSeries[/url] and by updating the data on a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.Heatmap2DArrayDataSeries%603.html']Heatmap2DArrayDataSeries[/url].
The result is a smooth 30 FPS scrolling heatmap allowing you to visually inspect your spectrum data!
